transcription.text: In this video, LGBTIQA+ flags are overlaid on Heartbreak High characters to signal their sexual identities. With over 1M views, it speaks to the show's popularity but also the importance of screen representation. Until the 1990s, queer screen characters were uncommon, so audiences had to search for subtext or create fanfiction. Heartbreak High’s sexually (and culturally) diverse characters reflect our society and the evolution of screen representation, while easy-to-use video tools let fans create shareable content that celebrates diversity and strengthens community.
